defs: a man whose profession is making jingling bells (for anklets).
a sub-caste among śudras.
= ಗೆಜ್ಜೆಗಾರ.
the plant Crotalaria retusa of Papilionaceae family; sweet pea.
the bubbling stage of a liquid while being boiled (esp. when the small bubbles come from below while sugarcane juice is boiled for making jaggery).
a kind of chain with jingling bells used as an anklet.
a stick ornamented with jingling bells, used in pairs in folk dances performed in group.

a metal waist-belt, worn by women, adorned with small jingling bells.

a toe-ring with a tiny bell or bells, used by women.
a ceremonial worshipping of the anklets adorned with jingle bells, while starting the practice of a folk-drama.
a ceremony held, worshipping the jingling anklets of a dancer, while a woman is formally initiated into prostitution as her profession.
